column.description: The number of agents that are currently logged in at all the DNs within a specified agent group, or at all the DNs at places within the specified place group.
column.label: Logged In

column.description: The number of agents who are currently in the Ready state. Typically, it represents the total number of agents waiting for customer interactions or specific tasks.
column.label: Ready

column.description: The number of agents who are currently logged in and who are currently in the NotReady state. Typically, it represents the total number of agents not available to handle incoming interactions.
column.label: Not Ready

column.description: The number of agents who are in Not Ready state with Reason Break.
column.label: Break

column.description: The number of agents who are in Not Ready state with Reason Lunch.
column.label: Lunch

column.description: The number of agents who are in Not Ready state with Reason different from Lunch and Break.
column.label: Offline

column.description: The current number of agents in the AfterCallWork status. Typically this status happens when an agent is no longer talking with the customer but still requires additional time to handle properly customer requests.
column.label: ACW

column.description: The current number of agents in CallConsult status (participating in consultation calls).
column.label: Consult

column.description: The current number of agents in CallDialing status (dialing calls).
column.label: Dialing

column.description: The current number of agents in CallOnHold status; that is, where the agent has one or more calls on hold.
column.label: On Hold

column.description: The current number of agents in CallInbound status; that is, where the agent is conducting one or more inbound calls.
column.label: Inbound

column.description: The current number of agents in CallOutbound status; that is, where the agent is conducting one or more outbound calls.
column.label: Outbound

column.description: The current number of agents in CallInternal status; that is, where the agent is conducting one or more internal calls.
column.label: Internal

column.description: The current number of agents in CallRinging status; that is, where one or more calls are waiting to be answered by an agent.
column.label: Ringing

column.description: The number of agents that are currently logged out from Genesys environment.
column.label: Logged Out

column.description: The percentage of agents ready to handle customers calls.
column.label: % Ready

column.description: The percentage of agents in a not ready status.
column.label: % Not Ready

column.description: The percentage of agents handling customer calls.
column.label: % Inbound

column.description: Total number of agents currently working

text: Result=Data.Current_Agents_Consult.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Dialing.Value + Data.Current_Agents_On_Hold.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Inbound.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Outbound.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Internal.Value + Data.Current_Agents_Ringing.Value;

column.label: Working

column.description: The total number of concurrent chats currently happening.
column.label: Concurrent Chats

column.description: The number of routable chats based on the defined capacity rules the Agent or Agent group can handle.
column.label: Capacity

column.description: The ratio of concurrent chats based on the total number of chats the Agent group can handle.

text: if (Data.Chat_Capacity_Formula.Value > 0) Result = 100 * Data.Chat_Concurrent_Sessions.Value / Data.Chat_Capacity_Formula.Value; else Result = 0;

column.label: %Occupancy

column.description: The total time that monitored agents were logged in. Applied to GroupAgents and GroupPlaces, this stat type calculates the total login time for all the agents belonging to the specified group.
column.label: Login Time

column.description: The total time this agent spent waiting for the next chat in Ready state.
column.label: Ready Time

column.description: The total time this agent spent in a not Ready status for chat media.
column.label: Not Ready Time

column.description: The total amount of time that chat popup was alerting the agent desktop. In case if Agent handles several chats in parallel only first Chat Inviting time will be counted in this statistic.
column.label: Alerting Time

column.description: The total amount of time the agent spent handling chats. The duration is not limited to the chat focus time. If Agent handles multiple chats in parallel they will be counted multiple times.
column.label: Handle Time

column.description: The average amount of time the agent spent handling chat The duration is not limited to the chat focus time.
column.label: AHT

column.description: The total number of chats that were offered for processing to this agent or agent group during the specified period. This stat type counts interactions both offered by business routing strategies and other agents.
column.label: Offered

column.description: The percentage of chats answered by the agent based on total of chats offered.
column.label: %Answered

column.description: The percentage of chats rejected by the agent based on total chats offered.
column.label: %Rejected

column.description: The percentage of chats missed by the agent based on total chats offered.
column.label: %Missed

column.description: The total number of chats that were offered for processing and that were answered by Agent during the specified period.
column.label: Answered

column.description: The total number of chats that were offered for processing and that were rejected during the specified period.
column.label: Rejected

column.description: The total number of chats that were offered for processing and that were missed during the specified period.
column.label: Missed

column.description: The total number of chats terminated by the agent.
column.label: Closed by Agent

column.description: Percentage of answered chats closed by Agent.

text: if (Data.Chat_Accepted.Value > 0) Result = 100 * Data.Chat_Closed_by_Agent.Value / Data.Chat_Accepted.Value; else Result = 0;

column.label: %Closed by Agent

column.description: Percentage of answered chats closed by the customer.

text: if (Data.Chat_Accepted.Value > Data.Chat_Closed_by_Agent.Value) Result = 100 * (Data.Chat_Accepted.Value - Data.Chat_Closed_by_Agent.Value) / Data.Chat_Accepted.Value; else Result = 0;

column.label: %Closed by Customer

column.description: The total number of chat transfers made by this agent or agent group during the specified period. Include transfer to skill or agent group.
column.label: Transfers Made

column.description: The percentage of chats transfered to another agent based on total of chats offered.

text: if (Data.Chat_Accepted.Value > 0) Result = Data.Chat_All_Transfers_Made.Value / Data.Chat_Accepted.Value; else Result = 0;

column.label: %Trans Made

column.description: Average duration spent with a customer while handling a chat session.
column.label: Avg Chat Duration

column.description: Minimum duration spent with a customer while handling a chat session.
column.label: Min Chat Duration

column.description: Maximum duration spent with a customer while handling a chat session.
column.label: Max Chat Duration

column.description: Total duration spent with a customer while handling a chat session.
column.label: Chat Duration

column.description: Avg customer wait for agent while handling a chat session.
column.label: Customer Avg Wait

column.description: Max customer wait for agent while handling a chat session.
column.label: Customer Max Wait

column.description: Avg duration before first agent greeting while handling a chat session.
column.label: Avg Greeting Time

column.description: Max duration before first agent greeting while handling a chat session.
column.label: Max Greeting Time

column.description: Average time it takes for agent to reply to a customer while handling a chat session.
column.label: Avg Response Time

column.description: Maximum time it takes for agent to reply to a customer while handling a chat session.
column.label: Max Response Time

column.description: Average size of the message sent by agent while handling a chat session.
column.label: Avg Message Size

column.description: Total number of repllies sent by the agent to the customer.
column.label: Agent Reply Total Number

column.description: Total time an agent spent replying to a customer.
column.label: Agent Reply Total Time

column.description: Total number of symbols agent typed in message.
column.label: Total Agent Message Size

column.description: Total number of messages sent by agent.
column.label: Total Agent Message Count
